content: A passed pawn is one that no longer has in front of it (either in its own column or in both adjacent columns) an opponent pawn that can (by blocking or capturing it) prevent its advance to the last row of the board.
translations: ita:Un pedone passato è quello che non ha più davanti (né nella propria colonna né nelle due colonne adiacenti) un pedone av
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
